channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Krays
channel.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of London's East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
channel.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBC's range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: International T20 Cricket
channel.desc: Highlights of the first game of the T20 series between England and South Africa.
